memories.content:
Made agents/ folder a proper Python module by:
1. Updated agents/__init__.py to export PredictionMarketAgent, OllamaLLM, MarketPlanningModule, MarketMemoryModule, MarketReasoningModule, PlaceholderMarketTools, and OllamaEmbeddings
2. Fixed imports in prediction_market_agent.py and ollama_llm.py to use relative imports (.websocietysimulator) instead of absolute imports
3. Module can now be imported with: from src.prediction_market_sim.agents import PredictionMarketAgent, OllamaLLM, etc.
memories.context: Prediction Market Agents Simulations project - agents module configuration
